short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Functions which stop the user from interacting with a webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash chaos on your browser with "Break the Internet", the ultimate tool for hampering internet activity. Ever wondered how dramatic bugs can get? This extension demonstrates six spectacular ways to "break the internet" using creative, real-world bugs.

Features:

Infinite Loop ‚ôæÔ∏è: Experience the classic developer nightmare. Initiate an infinite loop that jams your page, rendering it unresponsive and forcing you to close the tab after a frustrating delay.

Endless Alerts üö®: Flood your screen with infinite alerts, trapping you in an endless cycle of constant 'OK' clicks.

Cursor Blocker ‚õî: Watch helplessly as a block follows your cursor, blocking all other page elements and driving you to the brink of madness.

Midas Touch ‚ú®: Turn your cursor into a digital eraser, deleting everything it hovers over and making page interaction impossible.

Vanishing Cursor üïµÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è: Completely remove your cursor, leaving you helpless and struggling to navigate or click anything.

Page Deletion üí•: For those who want the ultimate break, simply delete the entire page with a single click.

Get ready to break, learn, and laugh with "Break the Internet"! ü§£
